events.name: GDD Europe Extended - Athens
events.description:
Hey all,

Το Google Developers Group Athens σας προσκαλεί την Δευτέρα 25 Σεπτεμβρίου στο GDD Extended Athens! 

Στόχος είναι να γνωριστούμε, να μάθουμε τα τελευταία τεχνολογικά νέα όπως ανακοινώθηκαν στην Πολωνία και συμμετέχουμε σε ένα hands-on workshop με θέμα "Intoduction to Google Material Design | HTML/CSS Basics".

Τι ειναι το Google Developer Days extended;

Στις 5-6 Σεπτεμβρίου πραγματοποιήθηκε ένα απο τα μεγαλύτερα Google events στην Ευρώπη, το Google Developer Days! Tα GDD extended είναι μικρότερα events που οργανώνονται απο τα τοπικά Google Developers Groups και στόχο έχουν τόσο την γνωριμία των μελών της κοινότητας όσο και την ενημέρωση τους για τις τεχνολογικές εξελίξεις μέσω workshops και networking. 

Πρόγραμμα:

17:30 - 17:45 | Check-in and παραλαβή του GDD T-shirt

17:45 - 18:00 | Καλωσόρισμα στο GDG Athens και WomenTechMakers Athens

18:00 - 19:00 |Hands-on Workshop "Introduction to Google Material Design | HTML/CSS Basics" με τον Γιάννη Εξιλζέ

19:00 - 20:00 |Προβολή GDD Europe 2017 Keynote: Tilke Judd, Jason Titus, Tal Oppenheimer, Francis Ma, Sara Robinson: Τα τελευταία νέα και ανακοινώσεις για προϊόντα και πλατφόρμες της Google

Συζήτηση και Networking

Cheers,

Evi Katsoulieri

[masked]

Ευχαριστούμε θερμά τoυς υποστηριχτές του GDG Athens: Radiojar, SimpleApps και Found.ation

events.name: DevFest Greece 2017

venue.name: Hotel Ibis Styles
venue.address_1: 26 Koroneou Street, And Angiou Titou, Iraklio 712 02

events.description:
DevFest Greece is opened to everybody interested in getting all the latest news and updates on technology and innovation.

This year’s DevFest Greece will see on stage top-notch developers and experts from different National and International lead companies, sharing their experiences with everybody attending.

After its first appearance in Heraklion back in 2015 with more than 950 participants, this year the four official Greek GDGs (GDG Athens, GDG Thessaloniki, Women Techmakers Greece, and GDG Heraklion) are joining forces to deliver to you the biggest Google tech conference! And this year we would like to open it up to all technologies and active communities in Crete. So don’t hesitate be there or be spare!

If you would like to attend and participate, please remember that registrations for DevFest are mandatory.

For the full agenda and tickets registration (free and exclusive tickets available), please visit our official site: https://heraklion.googledevelopers.gr/devfest-greece-2017/

or, attend the Facebook event: https://www.facebook.com/events/521826188171491/

See you at #devfestgr17

15-17 December 2017 @ Heraklion-Crete

GDG Greece Team

events.name: A/B Testing with Google Optimize
events.description:
• What we'll do
Στο επόμενο GDG Athens Μeetup ο Πέτρος Περλεπές, analytics engineer στην Growth, θα μας δείξει την σωστή διεξαγωγή A/B testing χρησιμοποιώντας το Google Optimize. Το Google Optimize είναι ένα εργαλείο από τη Google το οποίο μας επιτρέπει να δοκιμάσουμε διαφορετικές παραλλαγές του website μας με σκοπό τη δημιουργία προσωποποιημένων εμπειριών στις διάφορες ομάδες χρηστών μας.

Στο workshop αυτό θα μιλήσουμε για:
-Το τι πραγματικά είναι το A/B τεστ και ποια η ευρύτερη έννοια στην οποία συμβάλλει.
-Διαδικασία, παράμετροι και case studies.
-Αναλυτικά τις δυνατότητες του Google Optimize.
-Demo

Θα έχουμε χρόνο στο τέλος για ερωτήσεις και networking. :)

• Important to know

Η είσοδος είναι ελεύθερη αλλά οι θέσεις περιορισμένες. Για την καλύτερη οργάνωση του workshop, κάντε κράτηση της θέσης σας εδώ: https://www.eventora.com/en/Events/b-testing-google-optimize

events.name: Machine Learning Study Jam
events.description:
Το Machine Learning Study Jam ήρθε και στην Αθήνα! Πρόκειται για ένα hands-on εισαγωγικό crash course σε Machine Learning. Στόχος του course είναι η εξοικοίωση με concepts του ML και απευθύνεται κυρίως σε άτομα που έχουν καθόλου ή ελάχιστη εμπειρία με το αντικείμενο.

Εάν θέλεις να εξερευνήσεις το Machine Learning, αυτό το course είναι για εσένα!

Facilitator του course είναι ο Στέλιος Σταυρουλάκης, Ηλεκτρολόγος Μηχανικός και Μηχανικός Υπολογιστών ΕΜΠ, που έχει εντρυφήσει στο Machine Learning στα πλαίσια της διπλωματικής του εργασίας και έχει κάνει internship στο San Francisco πάνω σε Data Science.

Doors open @17:30
Found.ation

events.name: Google Firebase - Building Secure Apps & Best Practices
events.description:
❗ Hi everyone,
we are excited to announce that our next GDG Athens Meetup will take place on November 1st 2018, Thursday, at The HUB Events between 18:30 - 21:30. Our key speaker will be Mike McDonald, Product Manager at Google.

After the Firebase Summit that will take place in Prague on October, Mike will join our meetup, to share his exprerience on Google Firebase & Google Cloud Services and best practices! Our meetup will end up with a networking party - don’t miss it!

🔥 Agenda:
18:30 - 19:00 | Welcome & Registrations
19:00 - 20:30 | Talk
20:30 - 21:30 | It’s Party Time!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

💬 Title: How Firebase and Serverless help you quickly build secure apps + Q&A Session by Mike McDonald, Product Manager at Google.

Description: In a world filled with security breaches making the front page of newspapers, how do you balance the velocity gains of serverless without compromising application security? In this talk, we'll discuss common threat models, as well as how you can use the tools provided in Firebase and Google Cloud to secure your applications. After explaining what Firebase and Google Cloud are and why you might use them, we'll dive deep on best practices for using identity based authentication as well as how to configure Firebase Rules and Cloud IAM for least privilege access. We'll also talk about all the work GCP automatically does for you to keep your app secure.

Bio: Mike helps developers build better mobile and web apps as a product manager on the Firebase team. Mike has been working on Firebase for four years, and has previously worked developing iOS apps at the Omni Group and building microprocessors at Texas Instruments. In his free time, he enjoys spending time in the outdoors, cooking, and hacking on embedded hardware.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Are you working on something interesting that you want to share? Will you be interested to speak at our upcoming meetups? That’s great - fill in the form 👉 bit.ly/gdgathens_speaker and we will ping you ASAP!

Share the news and let’s stay in touch.

events.name: ML APIs and AutoML techniques | Machine Learning for all developers
events.description:
❗ Hi everyone,
we are excited to announce that our next GDG Athens Meetup will take place on Wednesday, March 27th 2019 at Found.ation between 19:00 - 21:00. Our key speaker will be Laurent Picard, Developer Relations at Google Cloud Platform. We can't wait to meet you all!

🔥 Agenda:
19:00 - 19:15 | Welcome & Registrations
19:15 - 21:00 | Talk + Q&A + It’s Party Time!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

💬 Title: ML APIs and AutoML techniques | Machine Learning for all developers

Description: Machine learning has seen so much progress lately that we, developers, can now build ML-based solutions without being experts. With pre-trained models, machine learning APIs can analyze or transform our data. Moreover, AutoML techniques can customize these models, solve more specific problems, and provide insights tailored to our own needs. In this session, we'll explore what any developer can do and you’ll be an active player of a live demo. Don't put your smartphone in airplane mode!

Bio: Laurent is a developer passionate about software, hardware, science and anything shaping the future. He works for Google where he ecstatically explores cloud technologies. In a previous life, he pioneered the ebook industry, co-created the 1st European ebook reader, and co-founded Bookeen. He now enjoys sharing his passion in international conferences. You can find him on twitter at @PicardParis.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

❗ Don't miss out the upcoming IWD19 | WTM tech Summit on Saturday, 30rd March 2019, between 11:00 am. - 21:00 pm. 🔥 Tensorflow, Machine Learning, Android, Firebase, Artificial Intelligence and more tech topics + Face2Face Meetings with Google Developer Experts + Party Time! 👉 Book your ticket now http://bit.ly/wtm_iwd19

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Are you working on something interesting that you want to share? Will you be interested to speak at our upcoming meetups? That’s great - fill in the form 👉 bit.ly/gdgathens_speaker and we will ping you ASAP!

Share the news and let’s stay in touch.

upcoming.name: Create a Trello like app with Angular and GraphQL
upcoming.description:
❗ Hi everyone,
we are excited to announce that our next GDG Athens Meetup will take place on Tuesday, July 23th 2019 at Found.ation between 19:00 - 21:00. Our key speaker will be Fanis Prodromou, CTO at Butler Company. We can't wait to meet you all!

🔥 Agenda:
19:00 - 19:15 | Welcome & Registrations
19:15 - 21:00 | Talk + Q&A + It’s Party Time!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

💬 Title: Create a Trello like app with Angular and GraphQL

Description: What comes to your mind when you think of client-server communication? I bet REST. Right? There is another alternative which listens to GraphQL. In this talk we are going to explain what are the differences between the aforementioned, how we can use the Apollo state management in our Angular application, and finally how we can create a very simple Trello app.

Bio: Fanis is a Team Leader/Senior Software Engineer and works on a high tech company. He holds a BSc in Computer Science from Hellenic Open University. He has developed during the last 13 years a vast experience both in Front and Back-end with main aspects being the architectural design, the code quality, and the performance. He has worked in several big companies with technologies like C#, Java, .net MVC, Spring, in various departments such as Front-End/Back-End, Migration/Integration and many more. His passion is to build web apps with modern technologies like Angular and Node.js.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Are you working on something exciting that you want to share? Will you be interested to speak at our upcoming meetups? That’s great - fill in the form 👉 bit.ly/gdgathens_speaker and we will ping you ASAP!

💥 Are you interested to support our upcoming events and become a sponsor? Don't hesitate to contact us!

organizers.name: Leo K.
organizers.bio: 🎮 I'm Leo! I'm the co-founder & Lead Developer at SimpleApps, a Mobile and Digital Agency in Athens, GR (Fortune 40Under40, Business Wall of Fame t-mobile). BSc in Computer Science & MSc in Mobile Computing. I love video games, OC PCs and technology

organizers.name: Magy K.
organizers.bio: It's me, Magy! I'm the co-Founder and Lead UI/UX Designer at SimpleApps.gr, a mobile and digital agency. Co-organizer at GDG Athens and WTM Greece. Studying CS and being a startupper were two beloved choices. I'm a gamer and technology enthusiast.

group_profile.title: GDG Athens
